channel.title: Stackstorm st2api Docker container setup
channel.description:
Is there any official support to utilize only st2apis and not managing other stackstorm services...I just need to use only st2api service(RabbitMQ and MongoDB as well)
I found official docker files for st2api is https://github.com/StackStorm/st2-dockerfiles/tree/master/st2api
but is there any documentation to use it and create a separate REST API docker image for creating executions using Stackstorm.

item.title: Stackstorm st2api Docker container setup
item.dc:creator: manoj-aps
item.description:
Is there any official support to utilize only st2apis and not managing other stackstorm servicesâ€¦I just need to use only st2api service(RabbitMQ and MongoDB as well)

I found official docker files for st2api is

GitHub

StackStorm/st2-dockerfiles

StackStorm Community Dockerfiles (one-service-per-container) used to build and push images to the StackStorm registry, used in 'stackstorm-ha' K8s Helm chart - StackStorm/st2-dockerfiles

but is there any documentation to use it and create a separate REST API docker image for creating executions using Stackstorm.

Read full topic
